field.name: Status
field.label: 状态:20-等待发货30-正在发货90-失败0-成功

field.name: Manual_Status
field.label: 人工状态:10-无需20-等待人工0-成功

field.name: Query_Status
field.label: 查询状态10-无需20-等待查询90-失败0-成功

item.name: getDeliveryDetialsByOrderNo
item.sql: select t.delivery_id, t.order_no, t.robot_ip, t.up_order_no, t.status, t.manual_status, t.result_msg, t.query_status, t.query_msg, t.query_ip, t.create_time, t.finish_time, t.query_create_time, t.next_query_time, t.query_cntr, t1.name StatusName, t2.name ManualStatusName, t3.name QueryStatusName from ORDER_DELIVERY t left join sys_dictionary t1 on t.status = t1.value and t1.type='DeliveryStatus' left join sys_dictionary t2 on t.manual_status = t2.value and t2.type ='ManualStatus' left join sys_dictionary t3 on t.query_status = t3.value and t3.type ='QueryStatus' where {@t.OrderNo}

item.name: getReviewList
getReviewCount
getList
getCount
